### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position(x=60.5 y=-61.5)
Consists of an inserter at position(x=60.5 y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position(x=61.5 y=-61.5)
Consists of an inserter at position(x=61.5 y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position(x=62.5 y=-60.5)
Consists of an inserter at position(x=62.5 y=-60.5) with fuel {} and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position(x=62.5 y=-61.5)
Consists of a chest at position(x=62.5 y=-61.5) with inventory {}.

### Offshore Pump at position(x=107.5 y=-33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=107.5 y=-33.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING and fluid_box {'name': 'water', 'amount': 100, 'temperature': 15}.

### Boiler at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0) with fuel {} and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5) with energy 15000.0 and status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe Group 1 at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of a pipe group with fluid system 142794, fluid water, and pipes at positions (x=107.5,y=-34.5),(x=109.5,y=-34.5),(x=108.5,y=-34.5),(x=109.5,y=-32.5),(x=109.5,y=-33.5),(x=109.5,y=-31.5).

### Pipe Group 2 at position(x=111.5 y=-33.5)
Consists of a pipe group with fluid system 142796 and pipes at positions (x=111.5,y=-33.5),(x=113.5,y=-33.5),(x=112.5,y=-33.5),...,(x=114.5,y=-33.5),(x=117.5,y=-33.5),(x=116.5,y=-33.5).

### Electricity Group at position(x=119.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of an electricity group with id 576328, poles at position(x=119.5,y=-30.5), and voltage 0.

### Belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of a belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### Belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of a belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect.
- Check that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when using inserters
- Make sure the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure that the inserter has a valid source and destination.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Check that the offshore pump is placed in a valid location.
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a valid fluid system.

### Errors when using boilers
- Make sure the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure that the boiler is connected to a valid fluid system.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Check that the steam engine is connected to a valid fluid system.
- Ensure that the steam engine has a valid input liquid.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- No important variables have been assigned.
